movies.title: Obywatel
movies.plot: The film begins with the protagonist's tragic accident that happens before his entering television building and that is coincidentally connected to the visit of the President of Poland in the building. After this, the action takes place in the hospital room where our protagonist is being brought back to life. In the patient's hallucinations his 60-year-life is being replayed- childhood, youth and adulthood- we follow it as it is inter wined with Poland's after war history, through various political systems until a surprising end.
movies.simplePlot: The film begins with the protagonist's tragic accident that happens before his entering television building and that is coincidentally connected to the visit of the President of Poland in ...

biography.bio: Jerzy Stuhr was born on April 18, 1947 in Kraków, Malopolskie, Poland as Jerzy Oskar Stuhr. He is an actor and writer, known for Three Colors: White (1994), Camera Buff (1979) and Habemus Papam (2011). He is married to Barbara Stuhr. They have two children.
biography.name: Jerzy Stuhr

biography.bio: Sonia Bohosiewicz was born on December 9, 1975 in Cieszyn, Slaskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Rezerwat (2007), Oblawa (2012) and Usta usta (2010). She is married to Piotr Majewski. They have one child.
biography.name: Sonia Bohosiewicz

biography.bio: Barbara Horawianka was born on May 14, 1930 in Katowice, Slaskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Passenger (1963), Obywatel (2014) and Echo (1964).
biography.name: Barbara Horawianka

biography.bio: Violetta Arlak was born on January 1, 1968 in Kraków, Malopolskie, Poland as Violetta Zmarlak. She is an actress, known for Ranczo (2006), Hi, Tereska (2001) and Nic (1998).
biography.name: Violetta Arlak

biography.bio: Robert Adamczyk is known for his work on Obywatel (2014) and The Art of Loving. Story of Michalina Wislocka (2017).
biography.name: Robert Adamczyk

biography.bio: Wlodzimierz Adamski was born on October 17, 1953 in Lódz, Lódzkie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Pierwsza milosc (2004), Gods (2014) and Pan Samochodzik i niesamowity dwór (1987).
biography.name: Wlodzimierz Adamski

biography.bio: Grzegorz Artman was born on April 5, 1971 in Pruszków, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor, known for The Pianist (2002), Anaesthesia (2003) and Nadzieja (2007).
biography.name: Grzegorz Artman

biography.bio: Ewa Audykowska was born on September 29, 1971 in Sroda Slaska, Dolnoslaskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Aria for a Cloakroom Worker (2009), Moje pieczone kurczaki (2002) and W imieniu diabla (2011).
biography.name: Ewa Audykowska

biography.bio: Pawel Audykowski was born on May 7, 1971 in Szczecin, Zachodniopomorskie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Trzy zwiazki (2001), Jestem twój (2009) and Billboard (1998).
biography.name: Pawel Audykowski

biography.bio: Maja Barelkowska was born on July 6, 1962 in Poznan, Wielkopolskie, Poland. She is an actress, known for Demon (2015), Edges of the Lord (2001) and Who Never Lived (2006). She is married to Piotr Cyrwus.
biography.name: Maja Barelkowska

biography.bio: Is Polish film and television actress. She was born in Krakow on the 12th of December 1978. Her debut was at the New Theatre in Lodzi, she was playing the title role in the arts Moorhen directed by Lukasz Kos. Since 2003 she works on the boards of the National Theatre in Warsaw, Carrousel Theater in Berlin and Teatro Tatro Slovakia. Since 2005 Magdalena plays in popular television series in Polish and German. Later she acted in the lead roles in popular films in Europe.
biography.name: Magdalena Boczarska

biography.bio: Stanislaw Brudny was born on May 16, 1930 in Pilzno, Podkarpackie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Statysci (2006), Katyn (2007) and The Forest (2009).
biography.name: Stanislaw Brudny

biography.bio: Andrzej Brzeski was born on November 14, 1949 in Warsaw, Mazowieckie, Poland. He is an actor, known for Ninas resa (2005), Teddy Bear (1981) and La semaine sainte (1995).
biography.name: Andrzej Brzeski

biography.bio: Jaroslaw Budnik was born on February 16, 1973 in Swietochlowice, Slaskie, Poland. He is an actor and assistant director, known for Avalon (2001), The Debt (1999) and My Nikifor (2004). He has been married to Jowita Budnik since 2005. They have one child.
biography.name: Jaroslaw Budnik
